## Getting Started

This practical introduces basic R operations and data handling.

```{r}
# Load required packages
library(tidyverse)

# Create a simple data frame
df <- tibble(ID = 1:5, Score = c(88, 92, 76, 81, 95))

# Summary statistics
summary(df)

# Plotting
ggplot(df, aes(x = ID, y = Score)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal()
